text: Apologies for the #powercut in #EX6 #Exminster surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by time. 12:00 Ian
Apologies for the #powercut in #Ferndale #CF43 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 06:00. Ellie
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Stroud #GL5 #GL6 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 04:30. Ellie
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Stroud #GL5 #GL6 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 03:40. Ellie
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #GwaelodYGarth  #CF15 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Ellie
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in #GwaelodYGarth #CF15 area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 01:00. Ellie
